blogData.title: Video Translation And Its Implications For FireTech
blogData.description: Talking to FireTech's Leigh Kelson, we cover the origins of the video translator app, and what video translation can do for clients. We also cover the role of AI and ML in the language space.
blogData.keywords: ai transcription, ai translation, ai translator, ai localization, video search engine optimisation, how AI video translation tech can be applied to public fire communications, how AI video translation tech can be applied to emergency communications to help the community understand vital information, basic intro to AI / Machine Learning, Big Data, Big Compute, future of AI in internationalization and localization
blogData.coverAlt: Video Translation And Its Implications For FireTech

data.richContent:
A recent interview with FireTech Connect was really good fun, with Leigh Kelson hosting a free-wheeling discussion about crisis, technology and the future of AI in the internationalization and localization space.

FireTech Connect

The FireTech 2020 program is an initiative of the Peregian Digital Hub, a leading technology incubator based in Noosa on Queensland’s Sunshine Coast.

FireTech Connect is funded by the Department of Industry, Science, Energy and Resources through the AusIndustry Entrepreneurs’ Programme; The Queensland State Government’s Advance Queensland Program; and Noosa Shire Council.

Leigh Kelson is the Program Director of FireTech - he is a technology entrepreneur, cloud computing pioneer, and media tech veteran. He has founded ten ventures over the last 30 years and had a number of successful exits. Over his career, he’s been a CEO of publicly listed companies, involved in raising more than $100 million in funding and completed two successful IPO’s on the Australian stock exchange.

Leigh is also an all-round good guy, and we are big fans of the work FireTech Connect is doing!

Conversation

Highlights

  • coping with crisis, a end user experience of the the Covid-19 crisis 0:41;
  • working in finance and hedge funds 3:41;
  • how AI video translation tech can be applied to public fire / emergency communications to help the community understand vital information 8:28;
  • a basic intro to AI / Machine Learning, Big Data, and Big Compute 18:55;
  • and talks about what’s next for Videotranslator.ai 29:27;

Conclusion

We hope you enjoyed the conversation, and stay tuned for more content!

Please connect with us on LinkedIn, YouTube or Facebook for any comments, questions, or just to keep up to date with the work we do!

If you are interested in trying out our technology, please try our platform or drop us an email at hello@videotranslator.ai.

nodes.title: Our Trusted Lingo Poster Was Accepted At AFAC '23!
nodes.description: Our poster on Project Trusted Lingo was accepted at the AFAC Conference. Learn more about our work and say hello to Mel Taylor at the event!

nodes.title: What Is EMDG Telling Us About Australian Exporters?
nodes.description: Austrade’s Export Market Development Grants (EMDG) program helps Australian businesses grow exports. Find out what the stats from this program mean!
nodes.coverAlt: Apa yang EMDG katakan kepada kita tentang eksportir Australia?
